backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Nebacrypt backend, implementing project submission management, user profile CRUD, access control, blob storage, and email notifications with Norwegian-language error messages.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three ICPInfoPage UI changes: renaming a heading to 'VÃ¥r teknologi', making hero section text black, and increasing background image blur for readability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the project's React/TypeScript frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Norwegian language attribute, SEO meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter Card metadata, and a vector favicon for the Nebacrypt app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing page routing (including the 'icp-info' route), authentication state, profile setup modal display, and wrapping the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying the Nebacrypt logo, copyright bar with caffeine.ai attribution, and contact details (org number, company name, and Oslo address) in a mobile-responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with desktop and mobile menus, Internet Identity login/logout handling, admin dashboard link for admins, and an 'Internet Computer' nav item pointing to the icp-info page.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Full-screen loading overlay showing the Nebacrypt logo with a pulse animation, a spinning ring, and the Norwegian text 'Laster inn...' while the app initializes.
frontend/src/components/MusicTrackCard.t: A card component that renders a clickable link to a Suno music track, with a helper function that parses a human-readable title from the Suno URL.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects name, email, and optional company from a new user and creates their profile via the useCreateUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/PublicSubmission: A public-facing project submission form that collects client details and budget, submits the project via useSubmitProject, and shows a success state after submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook that manage Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions, including user profile CRUD, project submission, and message queries, with cache invalidation helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining light and dark mode CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens (background, foreground, accent, etc.).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page that displays all project submissions in a table, allows status management (reviewed, followup, in-progress, completed), and supports messaging and delivery link features. Uses multiple query hooks and dialog-based detail views with Norwegian UI labels.
frontend/src/pages/ClientPortal.tsx: Client-facing portal page where authenticated users (via Internet Identity) can submit projects, view their project statuses, and exchange messages with admins. Includes login/logout handling and status badge rendering in Norwegian.
frontend/src/pages/ICPInfoPage.tsx: Informational page explaining the Internet Computer Protocol (ICP) technology, covering key pillars like canisters, subnets, chain-key cryptography, and use cases such as DeFi, NFTs, and social media, all written in Norwegian.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Main landing page for Nebadon Encryption featuring a hero section, ICP teaser, services overview, and contact section, with smooth scroll navigation and links to the client portal and music page.
frontend/src/pages/MusicPage.tsx: Music showcase page listing tracks by 'Synthetic Agondonters' with links to Suno, a hero image, and a description of the agondonter concept, along with a link to the artist's Suno profile.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (colors via oklch variables, fonts, border radii, shadows, animations) and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state for Nebacrypt, recording known issues and three existing fix features related to text and blur improvements on the ICPInfoPage.
